import React from 'react' import './Merchandising.css' import { useRef } from 'react' import pointImg from '../../assets/img/carrerOrange.svg' import triangleImg from '../../assets/img/triangleHautBas.svg' import statImg from '../../assets/img/troisBarres.svg' import { motion, useScroll,useTransform } from "framer-motion" export default function Merchandising() { const targetRef = useRef(null); const {scrollYProgress} =useScroll({ target:targetRef, offset:["0 1","1 1"], }); const scale = useTransform(scrollYProgress,[0,1], [0.5,1]); // const opacity = useTransform(scrollYProgress, [0,0.5], [1,0]); return (

The App for

Fashion

Merchandising

Depict lets you manage your

collection pages like a professional.

Editorial Merchandising

Manual curation at its finest

Curating products does not have to feel like doing your taxes. View stock status tags and preview your storefront on mobile & desktop.

Strategic Merchandising

Set boosting rules based on tags, collections, and dynamic groups

Organically boost key products across all collections. Or set rules to buty & hide products when needed.

Analytics

Auto-generated merchandising analytics

The easiest way for brands to be date-driven by tracking sales and stocj data for products and collections.
